Do you want to play again?

ERROR: External storage access has failed

string.name: aboutMessage
string.p: Each player chooses one of their 6 boxes - which cannot be empty -, picks up all the seeds it contains, and \"plants\" them one by one counterclockwise in the following boxes on the board (except in the opponent\'s store). The following rules apply:

ul.li: If the sowing ends in the player\'s store, the player gets another turn
If the sowing ends in one\'s own box that was empty, the player places the last seed and those in the opposite box of the other player into their own store
The game ends when either of the two players has all their boxes empty. If the opponent has seeds, they will be moved to the owner\'s store of the boxes

string.p: The player who accumulates the most seeds in their store wins.
